title: Microbiology
comment: Some parts of the lecture will be taught in English.

classes.notes: Teile der Vorlesung werden auf Englisch gehalten.Some parts of the lecture will be taught in English.

catalogue_data.description: Teaching of basic knowledge in microbiology with main focus on the topics: Prokaryotic Diversity, Microbial Cell Structure and Function, Molecular Genetics, Microbial Growth, Metabolic Diversity, Phylogeny and Taxonomy, as well as applied aspects of Biotechnology and the Interaction of Humans and Microbes.
catalogue_data.learning_objectives:
Subject-Specific Learning Objectives
The students
- understand important concepts and theories of microbiology, relating to the structure of cells as well as their function and metabolism.
- are familiar with methods and technologies in which microorganisms play an important role.
- know how microorganisms interact with the human body.
catalogue_data.content:
The focus is on the following topics:
- Prokaryotic diversity
- Bacterial cell biology
- Molecular genetics
- Growth physiology
- Biochemical diversity
- Phylogeny and taxonomy
- Biotechnology
- Interaction between humans and microorganisms
catalogue_data.lecture_notes: Presentation slides will be provided to students.
catalogue_data.literature: The topics are covered on the basis of the textbook Brock, Biology of Microorganisms.

performance_assessment.repetition: The performance assessment is offered every session. Repetition possible without re-enrolling for the course unit.
performance_assessment.additional_info:
Die Prüfungsfragen zu den auf Englisch unterrichteten Teilen werden auf Deutsch und Englisch gestellt.  
The exam questions related to the parts taught in English will be provided in German and English.
Antworten sind auf Englisch und Deutsch erlaubt/Responses are allowed in English and German.
performance_assessment.assessment_description: Performance assessment as a semester course
